term: TSO energy bid submission gate closure time
original_definition: 'TSO energy bid submission gate closure time' means the latest point in time when a connecting TSO can forward the balancing energy bids received from a balancing service provider to the activation optimisation function;
generated_definition: 'TSO energy bid submission gate closure time' means the time by which connecting tsos must submit all balancing energy bids received from balancing service providers to the activation optimisation function, as per articles 26 and 27.

Article 2: ‘TSO energy bid submission gate closure time’ means the latest point in time when a connecting TSO can forward the balancing energy bids received from a balancing service provider to the activation optimisation function;

‘TSO energy bid submission gate closure time’ means the latest point in time when aconnecting TSOcan forward thebalancing energybids received from abalancing service providerto theactivation optimisation function;
Article 19: the TSO energy bid submission gate closure time in accordance with Article 29( 13);
Article 20: the TSO energy bid submission gate closure time in accordance with Article 29( 13);
Article 21: the TSO energy bid submission gate closure time in accordance with Article 29( 13);
Article 24: be set before the TSO energy bid submission gate closure time.
Article 29: 9.   Each connecting TSO shall submit, prior to the TSO energy bid submission gate closure time, all balancing energy bids received from balancing service providers to the activation optimisation function, taking into account the requirements in Articles 26 and 27. The connecting TSOs shall not modify or withhold balancing energy bids, except for:
